My mom sent me a message again.

She said
column7: ""It's not 'Tall Man<del>'</del>
column8:
' it is 'Fat Man

When my mom came home
column9:
we searched it again.

My mom was right.



I saw pictures and a movie about the damages caused by an atomic bomb.

It was terrible and scary.

I hope this will never happen.":::

column1:
166:::"April 2

Today I will tell you about my trip last Sunday. (I like to travel often with my dad.). I went to Ganwon- do Junsun-gun. It was an hour's drive and it is almost the same as going to Yougju. It was very cold. My hands were numb with cold. There were a lot of people going there because the place is famous for its flowers. We also went to visit last year. I started to take a picture. The flowers were growing between the rocks on the cliff. It was a Pulastilla tongkangensis
column2: which is a type of flower. The pasque flower grows towards the ground
column3: but the Pulastilla grows towards the sky. I took a picture<del>s</del> of the flowers with my digital camera. The pictures came out well. I'd love to go again next year.":::

column1: 167:::"Wednesday
column2:
April 10.

Today's weather was almost like winter. It was very windy too.
The weather has gotten suddenly chilly.
So
column3:
we should be careful not to catch a cold.

I had a sad incident today.
I had started talking to native English speakers through the video phone for 20 minutes twice a week.
I'm sad about not being able to finish the class well last time.
When I connected the cable to the slot
column4:
the mic worked.
However
column5:
the sound wasn't working.
So
column6:
I have to check my computer on Thursday before the next class or I will have to study using the phone.
I had taken an English class by phone for a short time before.

I hope that my computer gets better.":::

column1: 168:::"Wednesday
column2:
April 17

I went to Deagu last Saturday. My mom made an appointment for me to see the doctor.
I'm not feeling sick. I went to an oriental medicine clinic to get some supplementary drinks.
The oriental medicine clinic prepares the medicine for your specific body-types.
I am neither tall nor small. I am petite and slim.
One of my classmates has grown a lot taller. But my weight stayed the same. I'm not sure what to do. What should I eat to gain weight? I don't put on weight a lot in comparison to how much I eat. I don't gain weight even with the usual amount of food I eat in a day.
I don't like medicine because it tastes bitter. I also hate drinking oriental medicine.
As the Korean proverb says
column3: ""The more bitter the taste of medicine
column4:
the better it is for the body.""
I don't want to drink it
column5:
but I must.
From now on
column6:
I will exercise really hard every day!
In the years to came
column7: I hope to stay healthy.":::

column1:
169:::"Wednesday April 24.

We went to the 365 Safe Town in April. The sky was dark. The field trip was going to be held in rain or shine. The weather was constantly changing.
There
column2: we would experience how it would feel <del>like </del>to experience a forest fire
column3: snow damage
column4: <ins>a </ins>typhoon
column5: an earthquake<ins>
column6:
and terrorism.
My family had been there before. I liked the earthquake experience the best. But this time
column7:
I liked the typhoon experience the best.
My friend
column8: Sun Wung
column9:
cried in the gondola when we were moving to the middle zone and the Cheoram zone.
Sun Wung also cried on the way to the Janseong zone. He lost his wallet in the Cheoram zone.
We went through a dark maze in Cheoram zone. We got lost in the maze and had to escape from the maze. The students wandered through the maze.
The false starts were the hardest. We had to find the door
column10: and some doors looked fake. After five minutes
column11: we found the entanglement door and it was open. So<del>
column12: </del> we opened another door and kept going. After about three minutes
column13:
my knees crashed on the bar. I turned on my phone and we kept going.
When we found the door
column14:
we opened it and found the 4th to 6th graders sitting inside.
It was very fun. Fortunately no one was hurt.
I've had a very weary day
column15: but it was still a very enjoyable trip. I want to go again.":::

column1:
170:::"Thursday May 2



This year Children's Day is on Sunday. This is why I'm sad.
I wanted to have one more day off for the holiday.
Our school is going hiking on Friday. The whole school will participate in the hiking trip.
We were divided into 8 teams. I belong to the 4th team.
The last time I hiked was several years ago.
I don't think I will have fun at this event. I want to hike on higher mountains like Chunryang Mountain.
I bet there would be a bit of snow because snow fell in the village quite recently.
The weatherman says there are clear days ahead of us.
I hope everyone is okay there.":::

171:::"I wrote about what happened throughout this week.

Tuesday May 7

Today
column2:
a cameraman from Andong MBC came to our school.
At first
column3:
I thought the cameraman was from the Gyeongsangbuk-do Office of Education.
However
column4: when I saw the sticker
column5:
it said ""MBC News.""
That is how I knew he was from Andong MBC.
Soon
column6:
it was 8:20.
We just watched the news.
Our library came on first.
But
column7:
I didn't know that our class (they filmed the whole school but they shot our class the most) was on the news.
So
column8:
we flipped channels.
Soon
column9:
my friend called me.
She said
column10: ""Did you see our class?"" so I said
column11: ""No
column12:
I just saw our library.""
The reporter said that there were too few books in our library
column13:
but there are over 10000 books there.
I don't know why they came. The news story was probably to ask people to donate books.

Wednesday May 8

We had a violin performance at the township office hall.
It was Parent's Day (May 8).
So
column14:
I thought only parents would be there.
When stepped onto the stage
column15:
I saw something that I wasn't expecting.
The hall was full of grandparents.
Today
column16:
my violin class got a gift certificate.
I can't wait for the next performance.":::

column1:
173:::"Tuesday May 21



The weather is hot outside so we go outside often.

We had P.E. class today. We played soccer.

I was going to get the ball but bumped into my friend.

My friend didn't get harmed
column2:
but I skinned my elbow.

I went to the clinic.

The nurse treated my elbow.

When I got home
column3: my mother said
column4:
""It's fortunate that you didn't get hurt
that much.""

My face wasn't hurt. Now
column5:
I'm fine.


I unearthed my old diaries before I went to bed.

I wrote about how I got hurt.

I was so tired. I played with my friend until eight o'clock.

I didn't think my arm hurt during the play time.


I'm feeling more and more tired these days. I think it's because I have been exercising.

I said
column6: ""Mom
column7: I am too tired to study."" She said with a laugh
column8:
""If you're tired you should rest.""

The last thing I do at night is usually read books
column9: but</mod> I could not do anything tonight.":::

column1:
174:::"Sunday May 26


I went fishing last weekend with my dad.

My dad is very fond of fishing. He is a good angler.

My dad taught me how to throw a good line.

I like skiing and reading
column2:
but I don't like fishing.

I cannot see the fun in fishing.

There was a change in the weather from sunny to rainy.

Even though I couldn't catch any fish
column3:
it was a lot of fun.

The fishing place was teeming with worms.

I hate the bugs there
column4:
but I enjoyed it a lot.


# Good news May 30

I got a letter from my old teacher. My old school teacher is now the school vice-commissioner. My old teacher is now in Uiseong. I'll send a letter to him later. I want to send a message to him
column5: but I think he'll be too busy. I miss my old teacher.":::

column1:
175:::"Monday June 3

Can you ride a bicycle?

I hung out with friends recently. We also do many fun activities after school.

My friends are cycling along the path. One of them can ride a bicycle with both their

hands off the handlebars. Also
column2:
my friends walk or bike to school.

I think it would save so much time if I had a bicycle.

Yesterday
column3:
I rode a bike. My dad taught me how to ride a bike.

(I learned to ride a bike when I was five.) It took just a short time to learn how to

ride a bike. However
column4:
I kept trying and finally learned to ride a bike.

I think riding a bike is great fun. I can ride my bike to school instead of walking.

I fell off my bike and bruised my knee. My elbow hurt because I skinned it.

I cycled around the corner
column5: lost my balance
column6:
and fell off.

I feel great because I know I am getting healthier.":::

column1:
176:::"Monday June 10

I was in Seoul on the 6th of June. We we rode in a car for 4 hours. Seoul was 290 km away.

In Seoul
column2:
there are many things to do and many things to see.

On the first night
column3:
my family went to N tower (Namsan tower). Namsan stands tall in the heart of Seoul.

From Namsan
column4:
you can get the night view of Seoul in a glance. The night view is said to be amazing.

There are people who walk up the Namsan. Other people take the cable car. We used the cable car.

There are many sights to see in Seoul . There were many tourists who came to see the sights.

On the second day
column5:
I met my uncle in Anyang-Si. We went to the Gwacheon science museum.

I learned new factslike that the perfect area for a planet similar to Earth is called
the 'Goldilocks Zone'.

The Zoo is near the museum. The zoo was crowded with people. We went to the zoo and saw elephants
column6: tigers
column7: lions
column8:
and other animals. It was fun.

On the last day
column9:
we were stuck on a highway going to Yeoju IC.

The road was crowded with holiday traffic. Our holiday flew by so fast.
I can't wait until my next holiday.":::

column1:
177:::"Tuesday June 18

The weather is strange. It rained some days ago.

It's hot now. We're using fans now.

My mom said
column2:
""The rainy season has begun!""

After the video phone class I came to wonder
column3:
""How is the weather in the Philippines?""

When is the rainy season?

I wrote a letter to my English teacher 'Cleo'. I got a response from her.

The weather in the Philippines was okay. It isn't too hot nor is it too cold.

However
column4:
the rainy season has started. It starts in late May and lasts until late August.

I think the situation is similar in my town now.

It's really hot and damp since the rainy days set in. The weather goes back and forth.

I'm already sick and tired of the rainy season.

How long does the rainy season last? I hope this rainy season ends soon.

As I mentioned earlier
column5: I hate the muddy ground.":::

column1: 178:::"Tuesday<ins>
column2:
June 27


My final test is just around the corner.
My test is on next Tuesday.

When I get a score of 100 in all my exams
column3:
I can download the desktop version of Minecraft.
My mom granted me three wishes. It was what I wanted most of all.

I study from 8:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m.
When I study for exams
column4:
I keep to a rigid schedule.

I studied very hard for my social studies.
Last night
column5: I studied until midnight
column6:
because I was busy with one thing or another.

I could be doing other things like studying for my test
column7: playing the violin<ins>
column8:
or reading a book.

Then
column9:
I can really focus on my work.

I love Math and English. I want to study hard and get good grades.

My mother said to me
column10:
""Just play steady and you will achieve your goals!"" My mom is right.

""I'll do my best !!""":::

column1: 179:::"Wednesday<ins>
column2:
July 4

I'm going to tell you about my favorite pop songs.

My favortie songs are ""Daylight"" by Maroon 5
column3:
""F*ckin' Perfect"" by Pink and ""Where is the Love?"" by Black Eyed Peas.

""Daylight"" is currently my favorite Maroon 5 song.

I've always been a big fan of Pink because she has good vocals and her music is always bold.

""Where is the Love"" is quite an old song. I also appreciate the lyrics of the song.

I have other favorite pop songs.

I like ""Payphone"" by Marron 5 and ""Marry You"" by Bruno Mars.

I wrote down the lyrics of the song on my homepage.

When you go to my homepage
column4:
you can see ""음악갤러리~♪"" and click it.

Then
column5: all of my favorite songs are there.":::

column1:
180:::"2013.07.08.Monday
Today I got new music from my teacher. The music piece is called ""Trumpet Voluntary"". I think I'll love this song.
I've heard it before. Two years ago
column2:
the 6th graders played it at the school festival. I didn't know that I knew that song.
After I became a fourth grader
column3:
I learned to play a new instrument. My teacher showed us how to play a recorder. His performance was unusual.

I play two musical instruments
column4:
and I am now learning to play the recorder.
From what I know
column5:
my teacher is a top recorder player.
To be honest with you
column6: I really like learning new things. <mod target = But>However
column7: </mod> I really enjoy learning new instruments
column8:
and also playing new music. I think I could have done better.
Listening to music
column9:
> and playing the piano or other musical instruments can make you feel happy.
Learning to play music is something cool and exciting.
Do you play any musical instruments? If not
column10: I hope that you learn to play something. Summer vacation is drawing near.":::

column1: 181:::"Thursday<ins>
column2:
July 18



Tomorrow is the start of my summer vacation.

Starting next week
column3:
I have after-school activities.

My school activities are English
column4: Chinese character study<ins>
column5:
and violin.

The class I chose for the first time is Chinese. My Chinese character rating is 6.

I have certificate ratings of 8 and 7. I had a Chinese character test when I was in kindergarten.

The Chinese character test was once popular.

We were encouraged to learn Chinese characters at school.

We had to study at the dictation of the principal. He always makes a special point of studying Chinese characters.

I really like my English class
column6: but I'm sure I'll like the Chinese character class<ins>
column7:
too.

My progress is the fastest in my violin class. Right now
column8:
I' m really into playing violin.

When I played the violin
column9: my mom said
column10: ""You're face changes as the music from your violin changes. Also<ins>
column11:
you look really happy.""

I have to upgrade my skills first during summer vacation.":::

column1: 182:::"Tuesday<ins>
column2:
July 23

On Saturday
column3:
I was playing the violin.

While I was trying to wipe away my sweat
column4:
I dropped my violin.

My violin sounded strange. I couldn't play the violin for the weekend. I couldn't do anything because I was upset.

I had my violin tuned yesterday.

Now
column5: fortunately the sound is better. Also<ins>
column6:
I felt a little better.

I am learning the piece called ""

Mom said
column7: "" Next time
column8:
be careful with your violin. It's an extremely sensitive musical instrument.""

I know what you are saying

column1:
183:::"Tuesday 30 July

I got Korean chess (Janggi) today.

Last week
column2: my father promised to buy Janggi<ins> for me</ins>. However
column3:
all the stationery stores were closed.

Then
column4:
my mom gave me 'Sticky Stickz'. I played the game so many times in one day.

The rules of the game are
column5: first
column6: </del> to throw the dice
column7: look at what the dice says<ins>
column8: </ins> <del>and </del>grab the card which is indicated on the dice<ins>
column9:
and get the card for yourself.

Isn't it easy?

Today
column10: my mom
column11: my younger sister<ins>
column12:
and I went to the beauty shop to have my haircut.

My mom bought me a Janggi set at the stationery store next to the beauty shop.

I played Janggi with my daddy. Learning to play Janggi is not a easy
column13:
but Daddy says I am a quick learner.

I lack concentration. This game requires concentration.

My mom said
column14:
""Concentration! Ethan. You never have enough time because you never start anything.""

This will really help me out. From now on
column15:
I will study harder to learn more.

I am learning it during my summer vacation.

My daddy is very busy with his work. ""Please take the time to help me. Daddy. You can always help me.""":::

column1: 184:::"Monday<ins>
column2:
5 August

August 5th is my birthday.

Two days after my birthday
column3:
I'll go to the Gochang-gun tideland.

We'll sleep there for two nights.

We'll see the sunset on the first day.

I'm so excited. I can't wait.

I'm going to Gochang-gun tideland. We can have various experiences at the tideland.

We'll have a variety of experiences firsthand.

We can gather shellfish and dig out oysters in the mudflats. Also
column4:
I'm going to try how it feels to be in the saltpan.

This is a totally new experience for me. I look forward to the day.

On the second day
column5:
we will go see the dolmen in Gochang.

The Biosphere Reserve in Gochang was designated as a UNESCO's World Heritage Site on May 28
column6:
2013.

Even if I have more time
column7:
I don't know if there is anything else I can do.

It's 410km away
column8: and it takes 6 hours and 25 minut<ins>e</ins>s<mod target =
column9: > to get there</mod> if we don't get caught in traffic.":::

column1: 186:::"Thursday<ins>
column2:
August 22

Yesterday
column3:
I made a Hangul file on my computer.

It took me an hour to finish it.

My Korean typing speed is 265 keystrokes in 5 minutes.

My fastest speed is 346 keystrokes.

My English typing speed is 152 keystrokes per minute and my fastest speed is 189 keystrokes per minute.

My file is three pages long. It was hard. However
column4: it was fun
column5:
too.

An examination will take place shortly. I need to practice frequently.


I went to Uljin today.

Our first destination was an atomic power station.

We saw how it made atomic energy.

Our second destination was the Uljin Science Museum.

There was nothing to see. I am loath to recommend it.

Our third destination was the market.

We bought some aquatic products. After that
column6:
we headed home.

It was the last trip during summer vacation.":::

column1: 187:::"Tuesday<ins>
column2:
27 August

My teacher gave me a tenor recorder. It is 63cm long. It was too big for me.
My fingers are too short to play it. So
column3:
I have to rip my fingers. Think about it. That's a terrible idea.
I'm the first person to get a tenor recorder. My teacher gave it to me because I am good at playing the recorder.
My friend named Ja Geung got a bass recorder. The bass recorder is very big so she has to stand up to play it.
I'm really interested in playing musical instruments. I like to challenge myself. I want to do something new.
It takes a lot of practice to play the tenor recorder well. It won't be easy
column4:
but I'll win through in the end. Then I will learn something else.
My mom always said
column5:
""I think you will do a great job!."" I must do a better job tomorrow.
Sadly
column6: <ins> </ins><mod target = Today>today</mod>'s the last day of <ins>doing the </ins>English diary. It was a big help to me. It was a very interesting experience<ins>
column7: </ins> and if I get the chance
column8:
I'd like to try again.
Bye~

column1:
188:::"Last Sunday was my birthday. I was so excited and felt good.

I was thinking about my birthday present for a long time. All day long
column2:
I surfed the internet to look for my birthday present.

I wanted all kinds of toys
column3: </ins> but I had to choose. Finally
column4:
I found what I wanted. Lego Chima and Speed tacks.

My brother bought his birthday present
column5: too. My brother's birthday is Nov. 1<ins>
column6: </ins> but he couldn't wait. So<ins>
column7:
he asked my parents to buy his present in advance.

hahaha... He said he will not get any present on his birthday but only a special dinner and cake. My parents accepted it.

So we ordered our presents on the internet. Then
column8:
I played outside and came back.

My mom prepared a special dinner. Mom cooked barbequed pork ribs
column9:
and spaghetti for me.

There was a cake which my name was on it. Everything was delicious. I was happy with my family.



On Tuesday
column10:
my birthday presents were delivered. I was so happy to open them.H

Now
column11: </ins> I practice Speed tacks everyday. I play my Lego<ins>s</ins> with my brother's. My brother and I are so happy to have our toys.":::

column1:
189:::"I went to Yong-in Stadium for The Hunger Experience at Red Cross Youth.
I didn't know about the Hunger Experience. I just heard
column2:

When I got there

there were many people from all over Yong-In city from elementary school to high school.
Also
column4: </ins> the mayor came
column5:
too.

and he sang ""Gentle-man""

column9: </ins> but the experience was fun.":::

column2: </ins> I went to my friend's house to sleep over. I came back late today
column3:
so I couldn't write my diary yesterday. I'm so sorry for writing the diary late today.
All the time

column5:
but time flies so quickly.
Anyway
column6: my little brother and I played with my friend Chan-Ju. We didn't plan to sleep there<ins>
column7:
but I wanted to sleep over. My mom and my friend's mom allowed us to sleep together. We were so happy.

column8: > and</mod> Snake ladder game<mod target =
column10:

column11:

Outside
column12:

They worked very well. I brought them home. I will teach my close friends how to make arrows and bows with branches.
That was awesome!!
My mom came to pick us up. She bought dakgangjeong(닭강정) and yummy kimbap.
Today
column13:

However
column14: </mod> I had a really nice time with my friend. <mod target = From>Starting</mod> next week

column1:
191:::"I went to Neorigul Village (너리굴마을) in An-Sung with mommy's friends.
There were swimming pools
column2: </ins> <del>and </del>houses<ins>

and workshops.

We visited a souvenir store to look around. There were many kinds of jewelry and toys.

We had water fights outside. It was fun.

Grown-ups talked there
column4:
and my brother and I played Badook(바둑).

The park is so big and has lots of things to look at.
Next time
column5: we will visit there again<ins>
column6: </ins> and I hope I can swim there.":::

column4:

too.

column6:
too.

column6:
I bought hair pins for my mom.
Many children came to us and bought my ttakji and shooting Bakukan(슈팅바쿠칸). One man bought my Ninjago T-shirt for his nephew.
I earned a lot of money from it. I was so busy. The children liked my toys and ttakji.
I exchanged our tea warmer with a china cup. I also exchanged my dinosaur book with mom's jacket.
My mom bought me a wallet.
We ate pizza and Chinese dishes. We closed at 6 P.M.
I learned how to earn money and to sell. Also
column7:
I learned to wait.
This flea market will be open every month. I want to join next time

column1:
196:::"My family went to Caribbean Bay last Saturday.
My mom bought us new swimming suits (or swimsuits). This time
column2:
we bought long sleeve swimming suits (or swimsuits).
First
column3:
we went to the outside pool. My brother and I swam and made deep dives.
We tried to water slide for the first time with a big tube. I didn't try to water slide before because I was short and scared.
There were so many people waiting for the slide. We waited for our turn for a long time. My dad and I were in the same tube
column4:
and my brother and my mom were in another tube.
Finally
column5:
it was our turn. What fun!
I will try by myself all alone next time.
After that
column6: </ins> we watched people surfing. Some people did so well and some slipped away quickly. When I grow up
column7:
I want to surf like that.
We had a nice lunch and rest.
My mom told me about my history at Caribbean Bay. She said I was here when I was 10 months old. She said I played all day long in the water and loved this place.
So
column8: </ins> we came every year and <mod target = lots of>many</mod> times. I love playing in the water. Next week
column9:
I am going to Water Park with my class for a field trip.
I can't wait.":::

column1:
197:::"My brother got a prize. He was excited. It was for drawing a character from a book.

He got the third prize (장려상). I'm proud of him. It was his first prize this year.

I think he will get more prizes from now on. I got many prizes
column2:
too.

My little brother put the prize in a frame and hung it on the wall. My mom bought many frames to put the prizes in.

I asked her to buy them. When I visited my friends
column3:
there were many prizes in frames and hung on the wall in their rooms. I got that idea from there.

I will work hard at everything at school. I hope I get more prizes this year.":::

column1: 198:::"Today<ins>
column2: </ins> we had <mod target = dodgeball>dodge ball</mod> in <del>the </del>P.E. class. I am short<ins>
column3:
so the opposite team couldn't hit me with the ball.
We played the match twice. I was alive at the end once. The other time
column4:
I died almost at the end.
Groups 1
column6: and 4 were<ins> the</ins> same team and the other <mod target = teams were>team was</mod> groups 2
column8:
and 6.
Our team won twice. I was glad.
Tomorrow
column9: </ins> we have P.E. class again in the morning. I'm looking forward to it<del>
column10:
because I always have fun in that class.
Most of the time
column11:
we played Running Man. I hope we play Running Man tomorrow.
Also
column12: </ins> I asked my mom for <ins>an </ins>iced drink to drink after P.E. class. My mom said<ins>

column1:
199:::"I got a prize from school. It was about sending letters to the North Korean children on Memorial Day.

All of the class wrote letters to them. But
column2:
I wrote well. That's why I got a prize.

I was happy because this is my first prize in the third grade.

I showed it to my mom. My mom was so happy. She gave me a compliment for working hard.

My dad is on a business trip
column3: </ins> so he couldn't see it yet. But<ins>
column4:
today I will show him today.

From now on
column5:
I will work hard in school so I can get more prizes... HaHa....

It has already started....":::

column1: 200:::"We are at the camping site in Tae-an now. I'm very sleepy<ins>
column2:
but I realized that I didn't write in my journal today.

So
column3:
I'm writing about our camping trip. We are at the beach and I made a sandcastle. I became cold so we came back to our tent.

My parents bought a hammock for us this time. It's really cozy and comfortable. My brother and I like to swing in the hammock.

For dinner
column4:
we had a barbecue with sausages as usual. We gathered around the fire and talked.

My mom loved this part of camping.
We will stay here until this Saturday. So
column5:
I will skip school tomorrow. Hooray~
We are going fishing tomorrow. I can't wait.
I wish to catch a big fish. I'm so tired now. Good night.":::

column1: 201:::"Tomorrow is my grandma's birthday. So<ins>
column2:
we will go to my grandma's house in Jeon-ju.

It's been a long time since I've been there. I'm looking forward to going there.

When we are there
column3:
we are going to play outside.

My uncle's family and aunt's family will be there
column4:
too. We will meet them and have a birthday party together.
I am going to write a card for my grandma.

I have a cousin
column5:
Ha-nul. She's only two years old. She's cute.
I promised to buy earrings for my mom at the department store in Jeon-ju. My little brother is going to buy one for her
column6:
too.

It's because I couldn't give any presents for Parent's Day. My mom likes earrings.

I also want to buy a present for my dad
column7:
too.

Anyway
column8: I'm waiting for tomorrow. The end.":::

column1:
203:::"Last Sunday was my father's birthday.
We had a birthday party with a chocolate cake and chicken.
I was so excited. We had a celebration for our daddy.
After the party
column2: we went to watch the movie
column3:
Ironman 3.
It was the first time I got to go to the movie theater. I was so excited.
We bought coke
column4: popcorn
column5: nachos
column6:
and squid before entering the theater.
While watching the movie
column7: we ate our snacks. It was so fun<ins>
column8:
and I felt so happy.
However
column9: </mod> my little brother was scared because<ins> of</ins> the red<ins>
column10:
strange people in the movie. Those people stayed alive even when they were shot by guns.
So
column11: </ins> he asked my mom to go out<ins>
column12:
but we stayed until the end.
At the end of the movie
column13:
many Ironmen saved the president of America and other good people.
But Ironman lost his suit No. 42 in the last battle. The battle took place on Christmas. So
column14:
Ironman made fireworks with his other suits.
My brother was happy when the movie was finally over. I enjoyed the movie.
My family had a great time.":::

column1:
204:::"Today was Children's Day. My family went to the Yong-In city hall after church.

There was an event for children. There were many people and many things to do.

First
column2: we ate some chicken (닭꼬치)<ins>
column3:
and I wanted to play on the air bouncer. My little brother wanted to make wooden necklaces.

The line was too long. So
column4:
my dad and I waited for the air bouncer while my mom and my brother waited for the wooden necklaces.

Finally
column5: it was my turn. I was so excited but I could only ride it for a short time. The slide is the last part<ins>
column6:
but I tried it first.

It was very hot
column7:
and too many people were there. So we went to ride the sky train (경전철).

The train is new
column8: clean and nice. Since I was 6
column9: I <ins>have </ins>waited to ride the train. Now
column10:
the train has opened to the public.

My little brother and I watched what was happening outside and had fun. The last station was Everland. We turned back to return to the city hall.

On the way home
column11: we went to E-mart to buy toys. I got another Beadman game set
column12:
my brother bought another Lego Chima.

When I got home I was so excited. We had a good time playing with the toys.

I hope every day is just like Children's Day
column13: but</mod> my mom wants every day to be like Parents' Day.":::

column1:
205:::"Today was sports day. I was excited and nervous.

If it rained
column2:
then it would be held on Friday instead. I wanted it to be held on Friday because I wanted to practice more.

I thought that all the practice was fun
column3:
but it was sunny in the morning.

I am good at jumping rope. Haejun
column4: Minsung
column5: Kuemin
column6:
and I are the best at jumping rope.

The 3rd graders jumped rope. I did so well. After I finished
column7:
I looked around to find my mom because I was really hoping that my mom watched me.

However
column8: </mod> my mom came late and didn't see me. So<ins>
column9:
I was very angry.

Next
column10:
I won 2nd prize in a race.

Next
column11: the 3rd graders played a game where we had to toss the ball <del>for </del>the number of times that appeared on the card. For that game
column12:
백군 won.

My little brother and I were part of Team Baek-goon. Baek-goon won this year. The score was Baek-goon 730 to Chun-goon 650. This is was my first time winning. I was so pleased.

I wish my mom bought a flower candy for me after sports day.":::

column1:
206:::"We are doing an economy activity in my class right now with fake money.

My teacher made our class into a big country. It's called ""대박나라"".

So
column2: we can build our own company
column3: earn our own money
column4:
and buy something with that money.

I joined a cookie business. There are three people in my company.

Last weekend
column5:
I made lots of cookies with my mom and little brother.

I shaped the cookies with like a gingerbread man
column6: a snow angel
column7: trees
column8: stars
column9:
and many other kinds of shapes.

I usually like chocolate-chip cookies better
column10:
but this time we made sugar cookies.

We made twice the number of cookies than before because I wanted to sell them for one whole week.



On Monday l sold the cookies. So
column11:
I became the richest student in my class. Hahaha...

Some of my classmates bought them again and again. They loved my cookies.

Our cookie shop's name is Rainbow Cookie. It is the best shop.

Hahaha............

We do our best
column12:
and I think my teacher had a good idea about making this pretend economic system for our class.
Bestㅋㅋ

column1: 207:::"Last Saturday
column2:
we had a barbecue party at Aunt Ilsoon's house.

We ate lots of barbecued meat.

We had a barbecue in the garden
column3:
and I watched a baseball game inside the house during the barbecue.

There was a big window in the house so I could see in and out.

When the barbecue was ready
column4: I came outside and ate. After
column5: I went back inside to watch the baseball game
column6:
Samsung vs Nexen. I am a fan of the Samsung team.

I went outside again and ate more pork.

My mom's friend
column7: Judy
column8: and her family joined
column9: too. Judy has a daughter
column10:
Catherine.

She and my little brother
column11: Joel
column12:
ate the barbecue meat like monsters.

Catherine and I are the same age. However
column13:
we are not friendsbecause I don't like any girls.

Aunt Ilsoon's husband baked lots of sausages
column14:
too. I got two sausages and went inside and watched baseball again.

Luckily Samsung won the game. Samsung had 15 and Nexen had 4.

We had a great day.":::

column1: 209:::"Every Wednesday
column2:
we have a Gumdo class after dinner in my after-school program.
I didn't go to Taekwondo class because I wanted to join the Gumdo class.
Today we did Gumdo (검도) in the auditorium. I got a bamboo sword (죽도) from the Gumdo teacher.

The first graders and second graders received short
column3: </ins> <del>and </del>light swords
column4:
but I received the longer and heavier one since I am a third grader.

First
column5:
we learned to walk with the sword. (죽도를 목높이로 들고 걷는법). We also learned to hit others with the sword by holding the sword above heads heads and hitting the other's person's head.

After the Gumdo lesson
column6: we played volleyball with a balloon. I jumped to block the ball in front of the net<ins>
column7:
and I jumped to pass the ball hard just like a real volleyball player.

I got 5 points myself. Our team won because of me... Hahaha....

After the game
column8:
all of students were on one team and only the Gumdo teacher was on the other team. We were tied and then Gumdo class was over.

I will take the Gumdo class every Wednesday. It was good today.":::

column1:
210:::"I went to my friend Mason's house last Sunday after church.

He bought a new toy called the beadman. He wanted to show me the new toy and play with me.

Mason (Hyun Kyu) doesn't have any siblings. He's an only child.

So
column2:
my little brother and I went to his house.

At first
column3: I thought the beadman was very childish<mod target = . But>
column4: but</mod> after we played<del>
column5:
I changed my mind and now I think the beadman is very fun to play with.

Also
column6:
I now want to have one.

The beadman is very simple. We put the beads into the beadman's body and push the button on his back and the bead shoots out.

The beads try to knock the boomer down. If someone has many boomers left
column7:
then he or she loses the game.

The second game is to push a heavy triangle to the other side. If someone pushes the triangle to the other side
column8:
he or she wins.

I wanted to play with the beadman a lot
column9: </ins> but my friend wanted to play baseball with me. So<ins>
column10:
I couldn't play with it as much as I wanted.

That's why
column11: </del> I keep thinking of the beadman and I want my own beadman.":::

column1: 211:::"Today we played dodgeball in Taekwondo class. First
column2:
we divided into two teams.

I didn't care how many people were on my team. All I cared about was that I would do well.

We played dodgeball 5 times.

The game got started
column3:
and I died early in the first game.

I thought the game was kind of like war because the ball flies like a canon ball.

In the second game
column4: I survived until the end of game. I did it again and again for four more times.
column5:
>The best part of the game was when I avoided the ball which was coming toward of me quickly.

I hopped aside quickly
column6: it>.  It</mod> was hard work for me
column7:
but I made it.


In Taekwondo class
column8: we play many games such as soccer
column9: dodgeball
column10: jump rope
column11: horse-vault
column12: <ins>and </ins>air bounce<del>
column13: etc.</del> every Wednesday. So<ins>
column14:
I love to go toTaekwondo on Wednesdays the most.

My favorite game is air bounce.":::

column1: 212:::"I like Lego Chima (키마). I used to like Lego Ninjago a lot<ins>
column2: </ins> but Ninjago is over now. Now
column3:
the new Lego series is Chima.
I want to get all kinds of Chima
column4:
but my mom won't buy Lego Chima.
Since I liked Ninjago a lot last year
column5:
we bought many pieces of the Ninjago series for Christmas.

My little brother and I promised we would not buy any more legos until the end of this year.
However
column6: </mod> as soon as it was the beginning of the year
column7:
Ninjago was over and being replaced by Chima.
So
column8: </ins> I like Chima more than Ninjago now. I regret that I bought Ninjago<mod target = . But>
column9:
but the past is past.

Anyway
column10:
my uncle bought some of the Chima pieces for me on Chinese New Year's Day. I was very happy.
Last weekend my mom bought me another Chima piece because I did my work very well.
I like the rock bowling game with the Lego Chima.
My favorite character is Iquila
column11: my little brother likes Laval
column12:
and my mom likes Longtooth.
In Chima
column13: the golden key marble (골든 키구슬) is the most important thing since the golden key marble is just like oil. It helps to move every vehicle<ins>
column14:
and they can feel the power themselves.

I want to buy Cragger's ""aligator battle ship attack"" (크래거의 악어전함 공격). There are 7 characters in it.
That one is most expensive piece in the Chima series. It's a toy but the battle ship can float in the water.
That's why I want it.":::

column1:
213:::"It's March 14th. It's White Day.
I didn't think of it. So
column2:
I didn't bring any candies to school.
However
column3:
my classmates brought many kinds of candies.
On White Day
column4: </del> in Korea
column5:
most of the time boys give candies to girls so I think it's not
fair. However
column6: </mod> this time many girls brought candies
column7:
too. I was pleased.
I got eight candies. I ate 3 of them in the classroom. They were sweet.
I left the others to eat later.

My friends exchanged the sweets with each other. Some of my friends bought candies with our school money. (It's not real money. It is fake money that can only be used in my class).
I was a beggar since I didn't bring any.
I will bring my own goodies next time for Peppero Day and Valentine's Day.
I like March because there are many chances to eat goodies
column8: such as White Day
column9: Easter
column10:
etc.

In the evening my dad bought a really big box of candy for my mom.
Mom was so happy with that. My little brother wanted to eat it but my mommy didn't open it.
It is too beautiful of a box to open. She said she will enjoy looking at it and open it later.
She shared with us some other candy instead.
I ate lots of sweets so I needed to brush my teeth well that night.":::

column1:
214:::"My mom works so I have to go to after-school class (보육교실).
After class I go to the after-school class with my little brother.
I don't to want to go there because I don't have enough time to play
column2:
I think.
However
column3:
I don't have any choice because my mom works late.
On the first day
column4:
I got to school by 7:50 in the morning. We ate breakfast there.
It was yummy. After breakfast
column5:
we went to my class and studied.
When my classes are finished
column6:
my little brother and I go to Taekwondo and piano classes. Then we go back to the after-school class at my school. I guess there are about 20 students in my after-school program.
My best friends from the after-school program are Mason and Dae-man. Dae-man's mom is from Vietnam. We watched a Japanese movie. It was pretty scary.
Also
column7:
we played with our jump ropes outside.
Ten minutes later
column8: we went inside<mod target = . And>
column9:
and we played chess.
After 6 o'clock in the evening
column10:
we took the Taekwondo bus and came home.
It was so fun. So
column11:
I wrote in my diary about my after-school program.
I will go to my after school class every day with joy.":::

column1:
215:::"I love Taekwondo. I go to I CAN Taekwondo (아이캔태권도학원) class everyday.

Last Saturday
column2:
I went to Yong-In University to take the Pum-ddi (품띠) test with our Taekwondo class people.

I was nervous. My heart was pumping fast.

I was excited
column3:
too.

I practiced every day to become a Pumddi.

A Pum-ddi is longer than the other colored belts. It is 240 centimeters long. I really wanted to get it.

When I looked around the stadium
column4: there were many moms and dads<ins>
column5:
but my mom and dad didn't come.

I will ask them to come next time.

My number was 82. I was getting tired from waiting for my turn. I did Pum-sae (품새) first. I did my best.

Next
column6:
I had to have a match with another boy. I got a gold medal and passed my tests.

I was very pleased with that medal. One of my friends got a medal
column7:
too.

There were ten players on my Taekwondo team so we waited until 3 O'clock for everyone to finish. I was hungry and bored.

Before we went back home
column8: we went to a Chinese restaurant to eat black bean noodles (자장면). My Taekwondo master said<ins>
column9: </ins> ""Don't leave any food<ins>
column10:
"" so we it ate all.

We were hungry so we ate fast.

Now
column11: I'm still waiting for 품증
column12: which is a type of certification. I will get it<ins> at the</ins> end of this month. So<ins>
column13: </ins> I can't wait!!":::

column1: 216:::"My dad is a doctor. He is very famous. My dad took us to other countries. This year
column2: my family is going to Italy. Last year
column3: we went to Poland. After a few years<del>>/TR></del>
column4: I think my family will have traveled around the world.":::

column1: 217:::"My birthday is coming. It is this Sunday. I hope it doesn't rain on my birthday<mod target = . Because>because</mod> rain is no fun. I have been waiting for my birthday for 365 days! I was born on a very hot day. My mom was tired that day. Mom
column2: thank you! I love you!":::

column1: 218:::"Today
column2: I caught grasshoppers with my family. I wanted to catch butterflies<mod target = . But>
column3: but</mod> I couldn't catch any. My sister caught a yellow butterfly in <mod target = 2>two</mod> minutes. She was angry when the butterfly flew away. Tomorrow
column4: I wish I can catch many butterflies.":::

She calls my mom mummorish.
She calls my dad paparish.
She is like a comedian.
When I am with my friends or teachers

column3: kind voice. She will say something like this
column4: ""Sister
column5:
let's play!""

column6: at home<del>

she always talks with an active and happy voice. .

column2:

221:::"The sky is crying.
Drops are falling on my head.


The sky is sad.
It is sad because the enviroment is polluted.


The Earth is sad.
It is sad because nature is polluted and will be gone soon.

222:::"My mother is so beautiful.
She is kind
column2:
too.

She taught me about my final test earlier than my other friends.
That is why my score from yesterday was so high.

I think my mom is perfect at everything.
I can't live without my mom.
My mom is my treasure.
column3: I love you!>I love and treasure you mom!</mod>":::

column2: spaghetti
column3: pizza
column4: potato chips
column5: cake

and so on.
I like these foods because they are all so delicious.
Beef steak is really delicious.

Other kinds of steak can't even come close to the beef steak in comparison.
Beef steak

column9: potato chips

224:::"My favorite character is Rilakkuma because Rilakkuma is so cute and lovely.
Rilakkuma is a bear who is lazy and likes to sleep.
Rilakkuma is a boy. He likes to eat pancakes.

column2: Corilakkuma

column4:
too.

column1:
225:::"I went on trip to Thailand last week with my family.
My favorite place was the Tiger Zoo in Pattaya.
The funniest thing I saw was when a mother pig fed her milk to a baby tiger
column2:
and a mother tiger fed her milk to a baby pig.
I said
column3:
""Wow! That's so interesting!""
Baby tigers are so cute and small.
However
column4:
I don't think baby pigs are cute because they are so fat.
Next
column5:
I saw the tiger show.
It was fantastic!
The tigers jumped through a ring of fire!
I thought it was very dangerous.
The tigers were so cute that I wanted to take them to my home.
However
column6:
that would be impossible.
My trip to Thailand was really fun
column7:
and I had an interesting adventure there.
It's good to learn new things.":::

column1:
226:::"My dad has many jobs.
He is a scientist
column2: doctor
column3:
and professor.
I wonder how can he do all of these different things.
So I asked him
column4:
""How can you do all of these different jobs?""
He said
column5:
""It isn't hard. It's fun.""
I was surprised by what he said.
I think that he is a genius.
I'm happy beacuse my dad is so smart.
I love you dad!":::

column1:
227:::"I have a pet. It's a dog.
He is nine months old.
He is a Jindo dog.
His name is Ma-Um.
His fur is white and his eyes are a twinkling brown color.
After school
column2: when I come home
column3:
Ma-Um wags his tail.
Then I say
column4: ""Hi
column5:
Ma-Um. How are you today?""
I look into his eyes
column6: and I think he says
column7: ""I had lots of fun
column8:
thanks.""
My lovely pet Ma-Um is interested in so many things.
I will take good care of him and love him more.":::

column1:
228:::"It's a rainy day today.
I don't like rainy days.
It's too wet out.
It was raining so hard at eleven o'clock.

230:::"Do you know about different kinds of clouds?
Well
column2:
I do. Today I'll write about clouds.
Stratus and nimbostratus are low clouds.
Stratus clouds are low
column3:
thin blankets of clouds.
They are gray.
Nimbostratus clouds are the ones that rain or snow falls from.
They are dark gray. I think they look creepy.
Cumulus and cumulonimbus are vertical clouds.
Cumulus clouds are often seen during good weather.
They look like floating cotton.
We can see them on a sunny day.
We can see cumulonimbus clouds during tornadoes .
Altocumulus and altostratus are clouds in the middle.
Altocumulus clouds are gray and puffy.
They are usually seen on warm and humid summer mornings and often a sign that there will be thunderstorms later that day.
Altocumulus clouds can cover the entire sky and form before a rainstorm.
Cirrus
column4: cirrostratus<ins>
column5:
and cirrocumulus are high clouds.
Cirrus clouds look thin and wispy and are blown by high winds.
They usually mean that there will be fair or pleasant weather that day.
They are made of ice crystals.
Cirrostratus clouds are very thin sheets of clouds that cover large parts of the sky during the day. Cirricumulus clouds look like small
column6:
round puffs in the sky.
They look like mackerel clouds.
It's very funny.
Now do you know more about clouds?
I think you should know more about clouds after reading this.
Clouds can tell us about the weather.
Clouds can tell us many things
column7: so we have to be thankful for clouds.":::

Because Harry is the only one who can kill Voldemort. Voldemort wants to live forever. So he made Horcruxes by breaking his soul into seven pieces. Harry has to destroy the all seven Horcurxes in order to destroy Voldemort.

Well
column14: </del> <mod target = there>There</mod> are seven books in the Harry Potter series. So I will tell you what happens at the end. Harry destroys all of the Horcruxes! And Voldemort and his followers all die. After many years pass

a Sunday. It was quite windy but very warm. It was even a little hot.

I participated in a taekwondo contest with my friends in my taekwondo academy. There were many people present from other taekwondo academies and their parents. The contest was held in the 'Daegu Nature Science High School' (자연과학고). Also at the school there was had a music group that played some music for us.

The contest had two parts. The first part was a personal competition and the second part was a group competition. The players representing Daegu showed how they could crush wooden boards by kicking them. When one person ran and stepped on another player
column3:
he jumped and kicked the board. It was cool because he broke the wooden board.

Our taekwondo academy had three groups entered in the contest. Two groups were for 4th ~ 6th grade students and the last group was for 1st ~ 3rd students. Our team (1st ~ 3rd) got a trophy and a bronze medal. So I was very happy and I thought that I should practice more and harder.":::

column1: 279:::"I was arranging my old diaries when I saw this one. I thought that this diary entry was good. So<ins>
column2:
I fixed this diary entry.


Treasure hunting at night.


I went to a camp at my international school when I was in a foreign country. I went to the school's camp with my family and my friends in the evening. The school was really big so finding the treasure wasn't as easy as I thought it would have been. At school
column3: there were <mod target = 2>two</mod> ponds and lots of soccer fields for the children to play. However
column4: that day the ponds and fields were not used for playing soccer or games but for treasure hunting. The teacher giving instructions told <del>us </del>students that we should be careful as we try to find the treasure. She also said that <mod target = from>due to</mod> yesterday<ins>'s</ins> and today's rain<ins>
column5:
the soccer fields and the grass was soaked and very slippery. Then she showed us a rule chart. It read

1. Whoever finds the treasure can get whatever there is in the box.
2.The given time is 30 minutes.
3. Don't go in the ponds.(There are no treasures in there.)

So
column6: </ins> I was trying to find the treasure with my friend
column7: Vincent
column8: in the huge school yard. There were about 25 other people. It was raining a lot and frogs were croaking in the pond. I don't like frogs so I didn't go near the frog pond. As we were walking around
column9: there were children whispering about where the treasure could be hidden. <mod target = ut just>Just</mod> then
column10: I smelled marshmallow by the camp fire. So<ins>
column11: </ins> Vincent and I went to the camp fire and thought that after eating something
column12: we would get a better idea of where the treasure could be. After eating about <mod target = 3>three</mod> marshmallows
column13:
we started off on our adventure of finding the treasure.
When Vincent and I couldn't find the treasure
column14: we went deeper into the dark. There were lights from the flashlights of other children and from the camp fire. When we went deeper into the dark
column15: I was quite scared. <mod target = And the>The</mod> rain kept pouring
column16:
which made it scarier.
Suddenly
column17: I saw <mod target = 2>two</mod> little boxes in the dark. When Vincent and I got close
column18: I saw it. It was the treasure! Vincent and I came back to the camp fire with the treasure and ate marshmallows. My older sister came back a little later from trying to find the treasure with her friends. When I opened the treasure box
column19: there were lots of lollipops and candies. Also<ins>
column20:
there was a watch and stickers. Vincent's box included the same thing as mine.
After finding the treasure by ourselves
column21: I thought that even though it was scary to go in the dark to find the treasure in the rain
column22: I was happy that Vincent and I were the ones to find the treasure. I felt that I would want to go to the camp <del>once more </del>again.":::

column1: 280:::"I am learning about crickets in my science academy so I received <ins>two </ins>crickets. One was male and one was female. The female cricket had a backbone that was longer and lower at the end. From there
column2: the egg <mod target = comes>will come</mod> out. But it was strange that the female was bigger than the male. My teacher gave a special insect jelly for the crickets. It was in a small box so I set the crickets free into a larger box. Even though the crickets' chirping was small
column3: it was amazing. Crickets are only seen in the fall but these <ins>particular </ins>crickets were raised by humans. Only the male chirped and the female didn't. There are three reasons that only male crickets chirp. First
column4: they chirp when they are trying to attract a female. Second
column5: the crickets chirp when they are fighting. Finally
column6: they chirp after mating. The crickets are noisy especially at night. My friends said that their crickets died. But my crickets are healthy and strong. I want to know how many centimeters crickets can jump. A cricket lives for about 1 year. It lives for 7 months as an egg
column7: and 3 months as a caterpillar
column8: and the last 2 months as an adult insect. From September to May next year
column9: the cricket is an egg and from May to September
column10: it is caterpillar and the rest of the time it is an adult insect. It was fun learning about crickets.":::

column1: 281:::"I am learning about the history of America<del>
column2: </del> during the <mod target = 4th>fourth</mod> Ice-Age in my English class. So<ins>
column3:
I wrote a history imagination diary entry. The contents are below.


My Travels in America


Today
column4: as well as the other days
column5: there was less food. I ate breakfast and played with my friend
column6:
Vincent. When I came back our family was very happy because my dad found a bridge (land bridge). We would cross the bridge with Vincent's family and our dog 'gimi'. It was icy cold
outside. So
column7: I wore a thick coat made of animal fur. I also wore a hat made of rhinoceros fur. When we crossed the bridge
column8:
we slept one night and in the morning went to find things to eat. There were wild plants. Then I found a huge footprint. I told my dad that there
was a big animal around. Vincent's dad
column9: Vincent
column10: my dad
column11: and I tip-toed and followed the footprint I saw. At last<ins>
column12: </ins> we saw a huge mammoth. It was hairy and had two tusks. The mammoth was weak as if it had starved for weeks. The adults threw spears at the mammoth
column13: while Vincent and I threw as many stones as we could. The mammoth became angry and stamped its feet<mod target = . But>
column14: but</mod> then
column15: when it was hit with another spear
column16:
it fell down to the ground. We were happy because today we could have our stomachs full of food. I was so full that I couldn't even move. We saved some of the mammoth food to eat later and saved the fur to make clothes for ourselves. I wondered about what would happen tomorrow.
I found a plant which I had never seen before. I ate it. It was tasty. I cut some of that plant and brought it to our house. After that our family learned how to farm. My mom was happy but said never to eat plants that I didn't already know about. It was good that we didn't need to move because we could make our food even if it rained. Dad is trying to build our house stronger. I made a necklace out of rhinoceros teeth.
And I also made a sculpture out of a mammoth's tusk. I got the idea from the pointed end of the rhinoceros teeth. The necklace was a present for my mom and the sculpture was for my dad. Tomorrow is the 100th day of coming to this land
column17:
America. Mom said she would give us rice and sweet-potatoes for breakfast. Tomorrow we will make an earthen vessel to store food.
I will carve pictures of mammoths on the vessel. I think if I do that I will be more successful on the hunt.

It was fun to write a history imagination diary because I've never written in this style before.":::

It was windy in the morning and in the evening
column2:
but it was warm during the daytime.

On Saturday
column3: I went to the science academy. I made a bottle that water will not fall out of even when it is upside down. I made it with a bottle and a funnel. First
column4: cut the bottle <mod target = 1/3>a third</mod> of the way. Then
column5: glue the part of the bottle you cut on top of the funnel. Next
column6: decorate the outside of the bottle. Finally
column7: put water inside the bottle. To take out the water<del>
column8:
use a spigot.

This experiment was interesting because the water didn't leak even when the bottle holding the water was upside down. This thing uses the same principle as a fish-trap.

When the river flows
column9:
you set up a fence in a row. Then you set up a fence in a row again but this time leave space for a funnel and put it 5 to 6 meters up-stream. That is how you make a fish-trap.

My teacher said our whole class should bring crickets next time. I don't think that I can handle the cricket because even though I like insects
column10: I don't like crickets.":::

column1: 283:::"Last time
column2: my mother bought me a series of books called
column3:
the ""Korean History Letter."" The series has five books. I am reading the fourth book. Korean history is divided into five parts in this book.

The author describes Korean history as though she is a mother writing a letter to her child. I think the author is good at writing history books in a letter form because she wrote this book and along with many other historical letter books.

I was impressed with the Korean people because during the Goryeo dynasty
column4: when Mongolia attacked Goryeo
column5:
the king and noblemen ran away to an island but the people fought against Mongolia and defeated them. I think that the king and the noblemen were irresponsible because they didn't try to protect the commonwealth.

I respect King Sejong and Admiral Yi Sun-shin because King Sejong loved the people and made the Korean alphabet. Also
column6:
Admiral Yi Sun-shin fought for the nation against Japan with the 'Turtle Ship' and was always victorious until his death.

I think history is interesting. I want to read the rest of the series as soon as possible.":::

column1:
314:::"We went to a cafe today.
The cafe's name was Browny 70.
It is at Suji
column2:
Sungbok.
It was my first time visiting the cafe.
The cafe smelled yucky.
We told the waiter that we wanted an ice cream waffle.
As we waited for the yummy waffle
column3:
I read a book called The Last of the Mohicans.
It was quite fun.
After a few minutes passed
column4:
the waiter carried the waffle over and put it on the table.
There was some ice cream on top.
The flavors were chocolate and strawberry.
I liked the flavors.
The waffle was huge and looked very delicious.
There was some fruit and cream
column5:
too.
After a few bites
column6:
I grunted.
It was so yucky because of the ice cream and the cream!
The fruit was covered with cream and ice cream by then and tasted strange.
I wiped my dirty mouth with a napkin and then drank a cup of water in one gulp.
I wish I hadn't pleaded with Mom for an ice cream waffle.
Well
column7:
I guess that is what I get when I want more than enough.
Next time
column8:
I will just eat a plain waffle!

P.S. (postscript): Never eat an ice cream waffle at Browny 70 if you hate (or dislike) waffles. I really don't want you to go through all that trouble
column9: just like me. When you feel like you want something yucky
column10: I truly want you to go to Browny 70 and eat some ice cream waffle.":::

column1: 320:::"I went to Saipan last month. I was there for 3 nights and 4 days. On the first day
column2: I went to see the bird island with my family and the guide. When I saw it
column3: it just looked like an ordinary turtle that was too big. I didn't know why an island that looked just like an ordinary turtle was called a bird island. The guide explained that if you look at the bird island from above
column4: I may see it like a bird flying. I also went to several places like the last headquarters. I also saw some cannons there. After that

column6: I had breakfast and had an English class<mod target = . And>

column10: </ins> I washed up and had a good sleep. The third morning
column11: I went snorkeling. The island that I snorkeled on was Managuaha Island. At first I just saw blurry white water. When I went in until my feet weren't touching the floor
column12:
I saw lots of fish! I liked thier colors. I went to the hotel after the great snorkeling and ate some food! Then we went kayaking. I also swam in the ocean. I swallowed the ocean water several times. It was really salty. Then we played in the pool and ate barbecue for dinner and then slept deeply.

The last day
column13: I was really sad<mod target = . But>
column14: but</mod> I had to leave Saipan and we returned to Korea. I still miss Saipan a lot!":::

column1:
321:::"Today

I went to Sokcho(속초) with my mom and dad for 3 days. We go there every summer for vacation
column2:
because we have a family condo there on the beach.

We all love swimming in the sea
column3:
and I can go horseback riding in the sand.

This time I took a horse named Hamlet. I wasn't afraid of him at all. He was gentle and nice to me
column4:
and I was sorry because the time was too short.

I played with my dad swimming together in the sea. Sometimes we raced without a tube. Sometimes we rode the wave with our tube.

My cousin's family joined us. So
column5: </ins> I had more fun with them playing soccer <mod target = on>in</mod> the sand
column6: collecting pretty shells<ins>
column7:
and making sand castles.

One bad thing was that we could not bring our dog
column8:
Choco here. We had to leave him at my aunt's house for 3 days.

There were some jelly fishes in the sea this time. My dad found them first and told it to a coast guard.

I was so frightened because I heard some bad news about them on T.V.

My dad and the coast guard caught them all with plastic buckets. So
column9:
I felt a little better. My dad told me this jelly fish is not a poisonous one.

However
column10: </mod> <mod target = still I'm>I'm still</mod> afraid of them
column11: and I wish there <mod target = will>would</mod> be no jelly fish in Sokcho beach next time.":::

column1: 322:::"If I choose the longest day in a week
column2:
it will be Friday.

This is because Friday is the last weekday and the next day is Saturday.

However
column3:
I have my violin lesson and the art class on Fridays.

I can not help thinking about Saturday in the middle of classes.

I have a k-pop dance class in the county gym on Saturdays. It is the greatest thing I have ever done.

It is really fun
column4:
so I feel one hour passes like one minute.

I follow one of the famous dancing singers in the class. I love k-pop dance.

Then how can you sit still when you know you are going to have the k-pop dance tomorrow?

Then another week comes
column5:
and time goes slowly and slowly again.

column6: </mod> I just wait for the next weekend.":::

But I soon forgot thinking about her and played with other friends.

But I thought it would be more fun if she were there too.

I just hope she will come next time.":::

I didn't know that you had a lot of stress or lung cancer.
I thought you were so healthy because you were the best grandfather.
You are dead. What about your family?
Your family and I are very worried about you.
Well... I first heard the news from my mother.
I was very suprised and started to get worried about you.
You were always so kind
column6:
so I hope that you have gone to a good place.
I will never forget you.
I hope that you will be happy there.
I love you~~
From
column7: </mod> Yeawon":::

column1: 400:::"This morning
column2:
I looked out the window to see if Ring Ring came back.
But
column3:
Ring Ring still hadn't come back.
I sighed.....
I put on a shirt and pants. I combed my hair to get ready to go to school.
I looked out the window one more time.

column4:

I was very happy again.
I'm proud of Ring Ring.
I thought that Ring Ring wouldn't come back.
But
column5:
he he came back by himself.
I know that Ring Ring is the smartest dog in the world.
See you next time~~~^.^":::

""Ring Ring
column9:
where are you?"" I shouted.

His color is brown and he has a red collar.
And he has a chain that attaches to the collar.
Please find my dog Ring Ring.
Well if you find him

please send an e-mail to me at pk9709181never.com.
Thank you.":::

column1: 406:::"Today is Jun Young's birthday
column2:
and I got invited to his birthday party. First Seong Jun and I went to Jun Young's house because both of our moms had to go somewhere.

We got in the car and we were squished because there were 6 people in the car including myself. I went in the building and I was surprised. The rock was about 4-stories tall! There were different rocks that we could try to climb. There was rock-A
column3: rock-B
column4: rock-C
column5: rock-D
column6: rock-E
column7: rock-F
column8:
and rock-G.
First we were just playing and waiting for the food. Seong Jun and I played soccer. The other guys were looking at the iPad which Kevin had brought. I thought
column9: whenever there's a party and Kevin is invited
column10:
he always takes his iPad with him.

The food was ready
column11: but the birthday cake wasn't. Jun Young forgot his cake
column12: so my mom went to get it. We ate the food first
column13: then we were ready to climb the rocks. Everyone started with rock-A
column14:
because rock-A was the easiest. I climbed the rock. I was the second to climb the rock.
Jun Young was before me
column15: he was really <mod target = fast>good</mod> at climbing. We had a belt around our waist so we wouldn't fall down. It was not bad clim<ins>b</ins>ing the rock
column16:
but it was scary when I looked down from the top. It was not bad but it was a bit tiring.

Then I tried the other rocks. I tried rock-B
column17: <mod target = it>which</mod> was slightly harder than rock-A<del>.</del> <mod target = Because>because</mod> it was bumpy and there was a hole. I tried rock-C
column18: but it was even harder becau<ins>s</ins>e it turned diagonally in the middle. I didn't even want to try climbing rock-E
column19:
because in the middle we had to climb upside down.

When my mom got back
column20: she had the cake with her. We were ready to sing happy birthday. I helped the moms light the candles. Then we sang happy birthday in Korean
column21: English<ins>
column22: </ins> and Chinese. Then we ate the cake
column23:
and the party was nearly over. Suddenly the 2nd graders came and climbed the rock.

Finally there were only 15 minutes left. I tried rock-A and rock-B again. I did not have as much energy to climb it
column24: so it was more harder that time. Then all of us played soccer. Jun Young thought about 12 people will come but only 7 people came. So there was lots of food left. We all went home. It was a nice birthday party. I want to say this to Jun Young again: ""Happy Birthday Jun Young!""":::

column1:
407:::"World Math Day is from March 1-2. But the practice for World Math Day has already started in the beginning of February.

You can go to this website: www.worldmathday.com which is the official website for World Math Day. If this is the your first time on the website
column2: you can <del>go </del>register
column3: confirm everything
column4: and you'll soon get an e-mail with your user name and password. Then you <ins>can </ins>try out all the different levels. There is a Hall of Fame for each day. I was surprised because someone got about 10
column5: 000 points in one day!! In the Hall of Fame that day I had about 2
column6: 000 points
column7: that means he got 5 times more than me! Last year during the assembly
column8:
our teachers showed us a video of someone playing World Math Day. He got about 120 answers correct in 1 minute. Last year Max got a prize for getting the most points in the third grade. But I think most schools don't give prizes.

This year I hope I can get the most points and win the prize! I hope you enjoy playing World Math Day.":::

column3: James
column4: Kevin
column5: Michael
column6:
Jun Young) and me to his sleepover. We played a lot of Wii.

Only four people can play Wii at one time so while four people played Wii

and table tennis. It was really exciting but tiring.

Then we played the new Super Mario brothers game. I am really bad at this game because I could only go into world 1 and world 5. Then we all went to bed. Some of us kept playing with the iPad while no one was watching. All of us were asleep by 12:30 am.

The next morning

""Let's play basketball on the Wii."" So I agreed. The game was over and I won by 10-6. Everybody who lived in Horizon apartment went home by 9:30.

I went home too. I think it was better at Jun Young's sleepover because we also played outside. But it was good to have a sleepover.":::

column1: 410:::"I am in Fobbisea. In Fobbisea we play many different types of sports<del>
column2:
and represent the school. We usually practice soccer and T-ball.

In T-ball
column3: you put the ball
column4: such as a tennis ball or baseball
column5: on top of a stick made out of rubber. The rules are almost the same as baseball. If you get the ball you have to pass it to someone on the base
column6: and if you are on the base you have to tag the player from the other team with the ball. On the other team
column7: about 4 or 5 people were out. Next<ins>
column8: </ins> our team went up to bat and about 2 people hit a home run. I also hit a home run
column9:
and nobody on our team got out either!

If you do Fobbisea
column10: you can go to Beijing and play sports for your school. I really want to go to Beijing!<del>!

column1: 411:::"Today
column2: our school had a street fair. Juniors went in the morning<del>
column3: </del> and seniors went in the afternoon. Grade 4 did skipping
column4: fan painting
column5: paper cutting
column6: dragon making
column7: mask painting
column8: sand pictures
column9: willows<ins>
column10:
and making hong bao.

At the skipping station
column11: </ins> we skipped. At the fan painting booth
column12: we painted fans. Then we cut out anything we liked on a special sheet of paper. Next was dragon making. We made dragons. In the middle of the dragon
column13: you put something similar <mod target = to>on</mod> a spring. Later<ins>
column14:
everyone in 4th grade painted a masks. The mask was xiyangyang! Xiyangyang is a goat cartoon in China for kids around ages three to five! But everyone had to paint one.

For Chinese New Year (in China)
column15: </ins> people pour money <ins>in</ins>to buy<ins>ing</ins> presents
column16: clothes
column17: food
column18: and other stuff. And the Chinese put money or presents in a hong bao. Some of the Chinese say this is because every year
column19: nian (a monster) comes and does bad things to humans. Then they found out that the nian was afraid of <ins>the </ins>color red and loud noises. So they have lots of fireworks in China. And some Chinese people put red colors on the ou<ins>t</ins>side of their houses. And some people believe that if they give hong bao to their children
column20: the nian won't eat their child.":::

column1: 412:::"Today someone in our church got married. And our family went to celebrate. First
column2: their parents said
column3:
""Good luck in your new marriage."" Then they went off.

While I was eating
column4: the singers from Suzhou sang songs. Then a magician came out. He took the fan out and danced with it. Then he moved his fan across his face
column5: and his face changed. Soon
column6: another magician came out. She asked for a volunteer
column7: and a man came out. He tied the woman with <del>the </del>rope and went <del>in </del>somewhere together. Then the man's coat disappeared. And can you guess where it was? The woman was wearing it! The magic tricks were wonderful. I wondered
column8:
how did they do this? Maybe he pulled something when nobody was looking. Maybe the air pushed it and the face changed. I thought it was a mystery.

Lastly
column9: it was the circus. He put a cylinder shaped thing on the bottom. Then he balanced on it. One last thing
column10:
he put some bowls on the other edge and jumped. All the bowls were on his head! He was really good!

Today was a fun day but also one full of mystery. I really want to find out how the magician he did his tricks!":::

column1: 413:::"Today I went to Jun Young's house for a sleepover. My other friends came too. First we ate dinner
column2:

At night we went to a shop. We bought some drinks and marshmallows. At about 10:30 pm
column3:
we cooked the marshmallows and went to bed. But most of us did not sleep right away and played cards instead.

The next morning we played cards again. Then we ate dinner and played more games. First we played darts. Our team had the most points so our team won! Next we played paper airplanes. I was second. I was upset because I wanted to win! Lastly we played tuho. I won so I was happy this time! Every winner got a prize.

Today
column4: I was really happy and I want to go to another sleepover.":::

column13: </ins> our family went back <del>to </del>home. They sang happy birthday to me and I blew the candle out. Today was <ins>a </ins>very exciting day for me and I was happy.":::

column1: 416:::"Yesterday our school had a Christmas Concert. All of the students in our school performed in it<del>
column2:
except for the youngest kids. Our first performance was a song called ""I Saw Three Ships."" The narrators explained about the song and the we all played the recorders.

Then we sang the song. These are the lyrics of the song: ""I saw three ships come sailing in on Christmas day
column3:
on Christmas day. I saw three ships come sailing in on Christmas day in the morning. And all the bells on earth shall ring on Christmas day on Christmas day. And all the bells on earth shall ring on Christmas day in the morning. And all the angels on earth shall sing on Christmas day on Christmas day. And all the angels on earth shall sing on Christmas day in the morning."" And so on.

Then about 45 minutes later
column4: </ins> the string orchestra
column5: which I am <ins>a </ins>part of
